name: Snake But Also a Platformer
description:
Multitask a game of Snake with platforming, with the Snake as your only platform.

Use WASD to control  the Platformer and the Arrow Keys to control the Snake.

Inspired by a type of platform in the New Super Mario Bros. series which I could not find any name for.
